inputSpec.name: EGGD_CONDUCTOR_CONFIG
inputSpec.label: conductor app config
inputSpec.help: config file for app containing tokens etc

inputSpec.name: ASSAY_CONFIG
inputSpec.label: assay level config
inputSpec.help: Use given low level config for running analyses instead of inferring from name

inputSpec.name: upload_sentinel_record
inputSpec.label: Sentinel file
inputSpec.help: Sentinel file for run to analyse, uploaded by dx-streaming-upload

inputSpec.name: SAMPLESHEET
inputSpec.label: SampleSheet
inputSpec.help: Samplesheet for given run, if not given will attempt to find from sentinel file / upload tars. Must be given if using fastqs input.

inputSpec.name: RUN_INFO_XML
inputSpec.label: RunInfo.xml
inputSpec.help: RunInfo.xml file for the run, used to parse RunID from if providing an array of fastQs and not specifying with -RUN_ID. Not required if providing sentinel file.

inputSpec.name: FASTQS
inputSpec.label: fastqs
inputSpec.help: Set of fastqs to use for starting analysis on if already demultiplexed

inputSpec.name: SAMPLE_NAMES
inputSpec.label: sample names
inputSpec.help: Comma separated list of sample names for given fastqs, only required if running without samplesheet

inputSpec.name: DX_PROJECT
inputSpec.label: DNAnexus project id
inputSpec.help:
Project in which to run and store analysis outputs. 
 If not given a new one will be created from the run ID and assay code.

inputSpec.name: RUN_ID
inputSpec.label: ID of sequencing run
inputSpec.help: Parsed from samplesheet if not given

inputSpec.name: VALIDATE_SAMPLESHEET
inputSpec.label: validate samplesheet
inputSpec.help: Perform samplesheet validation and exit on invalid sheet

inputSpec.name: DEVELOPMENT
inputSpec.label: development
inputSpec.help: Name output project with 003 prefix and date instead of 002_{RUN_ID}_{ASSAY} format

inputSpec.name: TESTING
inputSpec.label: testing
inputSpec.help: Terminates all jobs and clears output files after launching - for testing use only

inputSpec.name: TESTING_SAMPLE_LIMIT
inputSpec.label: testing sample limit
inputSpec.help: int number samples to limit analyses to run on - for testing use only

inputSpec.name: DEMULTIPLEX_JOB_ID
inputSpec.label: demultiplexing job id
inputSpec.help: Optionally use fastqs from previous demultiplexing job, will skip demultiplexing stage

inputSpec.name: DEMULTIPLEX_OUT
inputSpec.label: demultiplex output path
inputSpec.help: Path to store demultiplexing output, if not given will default to parent of sentinel file. Should be in the format project:path

outputSpec.name: job_ids
outputSpec.label: job ids
outputSpec.help: comma separated string of launched job IDs
